notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the framework of the State task on the planned theme no. AAAA-A18-118032890141—4 “Collections of Living Plants of the Peter the Great Botanical Garden of Komarov Botanical Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences (history, current state, and development and use prospects)” and Grant of the Plenipotentiary of Bulgaria at JINR in 2019.
